ab.em: ahiiā ẏāsā ... humatanąm ... aṣ̌ahiiā āat̰ ... ẏaθā tū ī ... humāīm θβā īžīm ... 'θβōi staotarascā' ... uštā ahmāi... spəṇtā mainiiū ... vohū xšaθrəm vairīm ... vahištā īštiš

Ritual.ab: "Which are the formulae to be recited twice?

ahiiā ẏāsā (Y28.3)... humatanąm (Y35.2) ... aṣ̌ahiiā āat̰ (Y35.8) ... ẏaθā tū ī (Y39.4) ... humāīm θβā īžīm (Y41.3) ... θβōi staotarascā (Y41.5) ... uštā ahmāi (Y43.2)... spəṇtā mainiiū (Y47.2) ... vohū xšaθrəm vairīm (Y51.2) ... vahištā īštiš (Y53.2)
Cf. N N47.39c-40 (cf. Kotwal and Kreyenbroek, 2003: 214-7):
pad humatanąm andar āwarišn pad ān zamān ka nēk-tom *srīrəm arəduməm ā pad xwardan ā pad *tāftan ā pad dāštan hamāg 4 angust andar dārišn u-š ōh gardēnišn

ab.em: tā ātaxš zōhr xwarēd zōhr ā sar astpih ā sar yasn kardag ī mayān ka be ātaxš zōhr xwarēd astpih ā sar yasn kardag ī mayān ka astpih xward yasn kardag ā sar

Ritual.ab: At humatanąm, he has to bring it into (the fire). At that moment, when it is the nicest *srīrəm arəduməm, he has to hold his four fingers in (the bowl) while eating, while heating and holding it and he should turn (the offering within the bowl?).

Until the fire consumes the zōhr, viz. (until) the consumption of the zōhr, viz. (until) the consuption of the fat oin the bone, it is the middle section of the yasn (of the Seven Chapters). When the fire consumes the zōhr, viz. (until) the consumption of the fat on the bone, it is the middle section of the yasn (of the Seven Chapters). Whe the fire has consumed the zōhr, the it is the final section of the yasn (of the Seven Chapters).
